text: Paul Emil Maki (February 1, 1918 – September 4, 1974) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Sheboygan Red Skins during the 1941–42 season and averaged 4.4 points per game. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1974 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Minnesota Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Military personnel from Minnesota Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's basketball players Category:People from Aurora, Minnesota Category:Sheboygan Red Skins players
title: Paul Maki
